content.prompt: Which of the following contexts contributed most directly to the interest in trade with China as described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Increased need for laborers on railroad-building projects
Increased demand for resources and markets for goods
Decreased economic competition from European empires
Decreased activity in commercial trade across the Atlantic

topic.text: 6.12: Controversies over the Role of Government in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
